name: Design Systems Stats - Maker Week April 2019
description:
Twice a year, Figma hosts what we call "Maker Week". It's an internal event where people get together to work on something outside of their day-to-day work to improve Figma. 

In April 2019, a few of us got together to explore a concept around providing analytics for Design Systems. We did some lean research through twitter, designed some concepts, and managed to build a working prototype in just a few days! 

After positive response internally, we decided to officially staff the team, where Tom Lowry did a fantastic job designing the feature along with some very talented engineers. You can read more about the launch here: https://www.figma.com/blog/introducing-design-system-analytics/

This document is the final presentation we made to explain our concept to the company during the Maker Week presentation, and we hope it gives you a fun behind the scenes look into how we think about designing product improvements for Figma.
